title: Tomorrow's today
creator_credit: Park Film Studios and Henry Lewes
brief_description: A film record of children’s paintings, showing the manner in which the environment effects the choice of subject and the style of work itself. The paintings come from school children in the East End of London and provide a grim picture of the daily scene that confronts them.
